profile.name: Romain Guy
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Square | Graphics Programming Expert
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for graphics programming and Android development. Proficient in Kotlin, Java, and various tools and technologies.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained Filament, a real-time physically based rendering engine for Android.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Worked on various Android development projects and tools, including Kotlin and Jetpack Compose.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and contributed to multiple open-source projects on GitHub.

points: pathway: A set of APIs to manipulate graphics paths on Android.
shadow-pointer: Rendering high-quality shadow from the user's finger.
